__e: You remember that night? We sat together, we watched old Ben Burns and Stickleton.
And the others to Burns showed up to save us.
But then... You remember that night we sat together, we watched old Ben Burns and Stickleton? You remember that?
Mom, Dad! Mr. Burns is a vampire, and he has Bart!
- I told you Major Burns will go in 24 hours.
Dr. Burns is the best in the country, they told me.
